analyzed: gshin rjer ming gi yi ge la //

original: dbang phyug ma ni 'char bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang phyug ma ni 'char bar 'gyur //

original: srin por yi ge tshes la yang //
analyzed: srin por yi ge tshes la yang //

analyzed: khyab 'jug ma ni 'char bar 'gyur //

analyzed: chu bdag lnga dang bcu gsum la //

original: ta yi bdag mo phag yin no //
analyzed: ta yi bdag mo phag yin no //

original: rlung du drug dang bcu bzhi la //
analyzed: rlung du drug dang bcu bzhi la //

original: pa sde'i bdag mo dbang mor 'char //
analyzed: pa sde'i bdag mo dbang mor 'char //

original: bdun dang nya la rnam thos bur //
analyzed: bdun dang nya la rnam thos bur //

original: ya tshan rgan byed ma yang 'char //
analyzed: ya tshan rgan byed ma yang 'char //

original: dbang ldan brgyad dang gnam stong la //
analyzed: dbang ldan brgyad dang gnam stong la //

analyzed: sha sde sgeg mo chen mo 'char //

original: de ltar phyogs mtshams thams cad du //
analyzed: de ltar phyogs mtshams thams cad du //

analyzed: dkar mo tshes ni so so la //

original: ming gi yi ge dbang byed pa //
analyzed: ming gi yi ge dbang byed pa //
translated: are the letters of the name

original: rnal 'byor ma brgyad 'char bar grags ;
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma brgyad 'char bar grags ;

original: / rang phyogs nas song rgyal ba ste //
analyzed: / rang phyogs nas song rgyal ba ste //
translated: One’s own side is victory.

original: der 'jug rnams la zhe sdang byed //
analyzed: der 'jug rnams la zhe sdang byed //

original: stobs chen nus med chos ba la //
analyzed: stobs chen nus med chos ba la //
translated: The powerless one with great power is the Dharma.

original: 'khor lo bden par the tshom med //
analyzed: 'khor lo bden par the tshom med //
translated: The wheel is true, there is no doubt.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya //
translated: Now, I will explain something else:🔽The supreme wheel of the division of time,

original: dus sbyor byed pa'i 'khor lo mchog / gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis //
analyzed: dus sbyor byed pa'i 'khor lo mchog / gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis //
translated: by mere knowledge of which

original: las kun the tshom med par 'grub //
analyzed: las kun the tshom med par 'grub //
translated: all actions are accomplished without doubt.

original: lha yi gtso mo zhag gcig la //
analyzed: lha yi gtso mo zhag gcig la //
translated: The chief goddess is one day.

original: dus sbyor phyed pa nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: dus sbyor phyed pa nyi shu bzhi //
translated: The division of the time periods is twenty-four.

original: chu srang sum cu chu tshod gnyis //
analyzed: chu srang sum cu chu tshod gnyis //

original: lug gi dus sbyor phyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: lug gi dus sbyor phyed par 'gyur //

analyzed: nyin mo'i chu tshod bcu gnyis kyis // bgos pas thob pa chu tshod yin //

original: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur @89b thob srang //
analyzed: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur @89b thob srang //
translated: The remainder is multiplied by sixty, giving the karshas.

original: mtshan mo'ang de bzhin shes par bya //
analyzed: mtshan mo'ang de bzhin shes par bya //
translated: The night should be understood in the same way.

original: de las dus sbyor phyed pa yi //
analyzed: de las dus sbyor phyed pa yi //
translated: From that, the division of the time periods

original: longs spyod rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: longs spyod rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: is understood to be the enjoyment.

original: thog mar dang po nas brtsams te //
analyzed: thog mar dang po nas brtsams te //
translated: Beginning from the first,

original: gang 'dod lngas bsgyur ras gza' bsnan //
analyzed: gang 'dod lngas bsgyur ras gza' bsnan //

original: bdun gyis phye ba'i lhag ma rnams //🔽dus sbyor phyed pa'i gza' ru 'gyur //
analyzed: bdun gyis phye ba'i lhag ma rnams // dus sbyor phyed pa'i gza' ru 'gyur //
translated: The remainder of the division by seven🔽is the planet of the half-lagna.

original: dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po ni //
analyzed: dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po ni //
translated: The lords of the half-lagna

original: dang po la sogs nges par mthong //
analyzed: dang po la sogs nges par mthong //
translated: are seen to be the first and so forth.

original: rang sa nas bgrangs drug pa la //
analyzed: rang sa nas bgrangs drug pa la //
translated: Counting from one's own [sign], the sixth

original: bskor ba dus skyor che bdag gza' //
analyzed: bskor ba dus skyor che bdag gza' //
translated: is the great lord of the revolution of the period.

original: nyi ma'i pa sangs zla ba'i spen //
analyzed: nyi ma'i pa sangs zla ba'i spen //
translated: The sun is Mercury, the moon is Venus,

original: phur bu'i mig dmar de bzhin sbyar //
analyzed: phur bu'i mig dmar de bzhin sbyar //
translated: Mars is the eyes, and likewise Jupiter.

original: drug gi grangs la bskor ba yis //
analyzed: drug gi grangs la bskor ba yis //
translated: By the revolution of the number six,

original: dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po 'byung //
analyzed: dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po 'byung //
translated: the lord of the half-lagna arises.

original: drag po bsod nams gtsigs pa can //
analyzed: drag po bsod nams gtsigs pa can //
translated: Rudra, Puṇya, Bhīṣaṇa,

original: brtan pa spangs pa spong byed ma //
analyzed: brtan pa spangs pa spong byed ma //

original: 'chi ba dgra dang dge ba dang // gdug pa gtum mo smin drug dang // bdud rtsi'i dus mtshan drag byed ma //
analyzed: 'chi ba dgra dang dge ba dang // gdug pa gtum mo smin drug dang // bdud rtsi'i dus mtshan drag byed ma //
translated: Rākṣasa, Caṇḍāla, and Viṣṇu,

original: bi kra ma dang skrag byed ma //
analyzed: bi kra ma dang skrag byed ma //
translated: Aśani, Bhīma, and Vikrama,🔽Bhayaṅkarī,🔽Gaurī, and the famous Gūhāra,

original: go'u ha ra zhes grags dang // rgyu ma'i 'od zer chen mo dang // srog 'phrog mya ngan 'char ba ma //
analyzed: go'u ha ra zhes grags dang // rgyu ma'i 'od zer chen mo dang // srog 'phrog mya ngan 'char ba ma //
translated: Mahauṣadhi, Prāṇahāriṇī, and Śokasaṃbhavā,

original: da ha ni dang kun thos ma //
analyzed: da ha ni dang kun thos ma //
translated: Dāhanī and Kunthunī.

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim pa bzhin //
translated: These are the twenty-four, in order.

original: dus sbyor byed pa'i ming du dran //
analyzed: dus sbyor byed pa'i ming du dran //
translated: They are known by the names of the periods.

original: drag po dang ni gtsigs pa can //
analyzed: drag po dang ni gtsigs pa can //
translated: Rudra, Bhṛṅgiriṭi,

original: 'chi ba de bzhin dgra dang ni //
analyzed: 'chi ba de bzhin dgra dang ni //
translated: Yama, and likewise, Śakuni,

original: dus mtshan sgyur ma chen mo dang // skrag byed ma dang srog 'phrog ma //
analyzed: dus mtshan sgyur ma chen mo dang // skrag byed ma dang srog 'phrog ma //
translated: Kālarātri, Mahāśākinī, Bhayānakā, Prāṇaharā,

original: mya ngan ma dang da ha ni //
analyzed: mya ngan ma dang da ha ni //
translated: Śokā, and Dāhanī—

original: bcu po rtsub par yongs su grags //
analyzed: bcu po rtsub par yongs su grags //
translated: these ten are known as the fierce ones.

original: de rnams kun la dge ba yin //
analyzed: de rnams kun la dge ba yin //
translated: All of them are virtuous.

original: las byas 'jig pa 'byung zhes smra //
analyzed: las byas 'jig pa 'byung zhes smra //
translated: It is said that the destruction of karma arises.

original: kha ni gyen bltas thur bltas dang // 'phred la lta ba yod par snang /
analyzed: kha ni gyen bltas thur bltas dang // 'phred la lta ba yod par snang /
translated: There are those with mouths facing upward, downward, and sideways.

original: nyi ma spyod pa'i rim pa yis //🔽dus sbyor phyed pa shes par bya //
analyzed: nyi ma spyod pa'i rim pa yis // dus sbyor phyed pa shes par bya //
translated: By the process of the sun’s movement,🔽one should understand the division of the periods.

original: dus sbyor phyed la gcig yin te //
analyzed: dus sbyor phyed la gcig yin te //
translated: One period is half a period.

original: de ltar byas pas nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas nyi shu bzhi //
translated: Thus, there are twenty-four.

original: gyen thur 'phred kyi mtshan nyid kyang //
analyzed: gyen thur 'phred kyi mtshan nyid kyang //
translated: The characteristics of upward, downward, and sideways,

original: des par nyon cig ri sras mo //
analyzed: des par nyon cig ri sras mo //
translated: listen attentively, daughter of the mountains.

original: nyi ma gang la gnas pa yis //
analyzed: nyi ma gang la gnas pa yis //
translated: On whatever day the sun abides,

original: sngon ma'i phyed pa gyen pa bltas dran //
analyzed: sngon ma'i phyed pa gyen pa bltas dran //
translated: the upward-facing half of the previous day is remembered.

original: nyi ma dang ni lhan cig pa'i //
analyzed: nyi ma dang ni lhan cig pa'i //
translated: The house that is seen across from the sun

original: khyim ni 'phred la lta ba yin //🔽nyi ma'i phyi nas 'gro ba ni //🔽thur bltas dus sbyor phyed pa yin //
analyzed: khyim ni 'phred la lta ba yin // nyi ma'i phyi nas 'gro ba ni // thur bltas dus sbyor phyed pa yin //
translated: is the one that is to be entered.🔽The one that is seen after the sun🔽is the one that is to be entered in the second half of the day.

original: gyen thur 'phred kyi rim pa lta //
analyzed: gyen thur 'phred kyi rim pa lta //
translated: The one that is seen above, below, or across

original: dge ba'i las ni rung ma yin //
analyzed: dge ba'i las ni rung ma yin //
translated: is not suitable for virtuous activity.

original: de rnams spangs pa'i phyed pa la //
analyzed: de rnams spangs pa'i phyed pa la //
translated: The one that is entered after abandoning those

original: dge ba'i 'bras bu nges par mthong //
analyzed: dge ba'i 'bras bu nges par mthong //
translated: will certainly see the results of virtue.

original: 'di ltar las dang bya @90a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar las dang bya @90a * //
translated: Thus, the one that is to be entered

original: ba la // nyon mongs byed pa'i dus sbyor ni //
analyzed: ba la // nyon mongs byed pa'i dus sbyor ni //
translated: for the time of afflicted activity

original: 'phreng thur bltas pas nyon mongs par //
analyzed: 'phreng thur bltas pas nyon mongs par //
translated: is the one that is seen across from below,

original: byed 'gyur lha yi dbang phyug ma //
analyzed: byed 'gyur lha yi dbang phyug ma //
translated: the one that is afflicted by the lord of the gods.

original: kha ni 'phred bltas thur sbyor gyi //
analyzed: kha ni 'phred bltas thur sbyor gyi //
translated: The one that is seen across from above,🔽the one that is entered in the second half of the day,

original: phyed bas 'khor rnams zad par byed //
analyzed: phyed bas 'khor rnams zad par byed //
translated: will destroy the retinue.

original: gyen bltas zhes byar grags pa yis //
analyzed: gyen bltas zhes byar grags pa yis //
translated: The one that is seen above, known as the one that is seen above,

original: sde ba'i dgra kun pham par byed //
analyzed: sde ba'i dgra kun pham par byed //
translated: will defeat all the enemies of the army.

original: kha ni 'phred bltas dus sbyor gyi //
analyzed: kha ni 'phred bltas dus sbyor gyi //
translated: The one that is seen across from above,🔽the one that is entered in the second half of the day,

original: phyed pas dgra yang pham par byed //
analyzed: phyed pas dgra yang pham par byed //
translated: will defeat the enemies.

original: rang gi dus sbyor bdag po yis //
analyzed: rang gi dus sbyor bdag po yis //
translated: The one that is seen by the lord of one’s own time

original: phyed pas mthong na las kun 'grub //
analyzed: phyed pas mthong na las kun 'grub //
translated: will accomplish all activities.

original: de ltar dus sbyor phyed pa'ang //
analyzed: de ltar dus sbyor phyed pa'ang //
translated: Thus, the half-periods are explained.

original: bshad zin dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma //
analyzed: bshad zin dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma //
translated: The hero's lord of the house,

original: za ba khyim ni gang la gnas //
analyzed: za ba khyim ni gang la gnas //
translated: in which house does he eat?

original: de yi cha shas shes pa yis //🔽thams cad las ni de bzhin du //
analyzed: de yi cha shas shes pa yis // thams cad las ni de bzhin du //
translated: By knowing his part,🔽everything is accomplished

original: 'grub cing 'gyur bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: 'grub cing 'gyur bar byed pa yin //
translated: and transformed in the same way.

original: pra bha se dang rang lus gnas //
analyzed: pra bha se dang rang lus gnas //
translated: Prabhasa and one's own body🔽are the place of birth,🔽the place of death,🔽the place of enjoyment,

original: 'chi ba dgod par skye ba dang // 'bar ba dga' ba spyod pa dang // mi mthun byed pa su pa ta //
analyzed: 'chi ba dgod par skye ba dang // 'bar ba dga' ba spyod pa dang // mi mthun byed pa su pa ta //
translated: and the place of conflict.

original: 'byor ba rnams ni rim pa bzhin //🔽zla ba gang la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'byor ba rnams ni rim pa bzhin // zla ba gang la gnas pa yi //
translated: The attainments are in order.🔽By knowing the house of Aries

original: lug la sogs pa'i khyim shes pas //
analyzed: lug la sogs pa'i khyim shes pas //
translated: and so forth, in which month

original: de yi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: the results will arise.🔽Destruction, well-being, death,🔽gain of wealth, killing,

original: brlag pa bde legs 'chi ba dang / tashni nor thob gsod pa dang // dga' ba nyams pa nges pa'i dgra //
analyzed: brlag pa bde legs 'chi ba dang / tashni nor thob gsod pa dang // dga' ba nyams pa nges pa'i dgra //
translated: loss of joy, and certain enemies

original: rgyal ba 'chi ba legs 'ongs so //
analyzed: rgyal ba 'chi ba legs 'ongs so //
translated: are the results of the houses.

original: de ltar khyim gyi cha shas kyis //
analyzed: de ltar khyim gyi cha shas kyis //
translated: Thus, by the parts of the houses,

original: 'bras bu rim bzhin shes par bya //
analyzed: 'bras bu rim bzhin shes par bya //
translated: the results should be known in order.

original: zla ba'i longs spyod bzang ngan las //
analyzed: zla ba'i longs spyod bzang ngan las //
translated: From the good and bad enjoyment of the moon,

original: las dang bya ba nges par mthong //
analyzed: las dang bya ba nges par mthong //
translated: One should see the definite karma and action.

original: cha shas bzang nang gnas bltas te //
analyzed: cha shas bzang nang gnas bltas te //
translated: Looking at the good part within,

original: dge mi dge las don 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: dge mi dge las don 'grub 'gyur //
translated: the purpose of virtuous and nonvirtuous karma is accomplished.

original: thun phyed yongs su shes pa las //
analyzed: thun phyed yongs su shes pa las //
translated: From the complete knowledge of half a period,

original: rigs ldan 'char bar shes par bya //
analyzed: rigs ldan 'char bar shes par bya //
translated: one should know the arising of the Rāhu of the zodiac.

original: dgos 'dod thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dgos 'dod thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir //
translated: Because all necessary desires are accomplished,

original: shin tu gzab la spangs bar bya //
analyzed: shin tu gzab la spangs bar bya //
translated: one should be very careful and abandon it.

original: r'a hu dang ni rigs ldan gyis //
analyzed: r'a hu dang ni rigs ldan gyis //
translated: Rāhu and the zodiac

original: thun phyed bya ba nyams par byed //🔽gang gis rigs ldan longs spyod pa'i //
analyzed: thun phyed bya ba nyams par byed // gang gis rigs ldan longs spyod pa'i //
translated: destroy the activities of half a period.🔽If one does not know the period

original: thun mtshams gang yin mi shes par //
analyzed: thun mtshams gang yin mi shes par //
translated: of the enjoyment of the zodiac,

original: zas zhim zos kyang nad 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: zas zhim zos kyang nad 'gyur zhing //
translated: even if one eats delicious food, it becomes a disease;

original: nad pas sman 'thungs dug tu 'gyur //
analyzed: nad pas sman 'thungs dug tu 'gyur //
translated: if a sick person drinks medicine, it becomes poison.

original: sprul sos btab la khyung gis min //
analyzed: sprul sos btab la khyung gis min //
translated: The garuḍa does not apply to the nāga that has been revived;

original: de phyir rigs ldan sbyar ba spang //
analyzed: de phyir rigs ldan sbyar ba spang //
translated: therefore, one should abandon the application of the zodiac.

original: thun phyed brgyad du rab brjod pa //
analyzed: thun phyed brgyad du rab brjod pa //
translated: The half period is said to be eight.

original: nyi ma'i dus su r'a hu dang // de bzhin rigs ldan 'char ba dang // zla ba mig dmar gza' lhag dang // phur bu pa sangs spen pa dang // rim bzhin de rnams @90b brgyad dang ni //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dus su r'a hu dang // de bzhin rigs ldan 'char ba dang // zla ba mig dmar gza' lhag dang // phur bu pa sangs spen pa dang // rim bzhin de rnams @90b brgyad dang ni //
translated: in order, have eight,

original: bdun dang drug dang lnga dang ni //
analyzed: bdun dang drug dang lnga dang ni //
translated: seven, six, five,🔽four, three,

original: de bzhin bzhi dang gsum pa dang // gnyis dang gcig ces bya ba rnams //🔽gza' rnams so so'i thun byed min //
analyzed: de bzhin bzhi dang gsum pa dang // gnyis dang gcig ces bya ba rnams // gza' rnams so so'i thun byed min //
translated: two, and one periods each.

original: ring thung mtshan nyid shes bya ste //
analyzed: ring thung mtshan nyid shes bya ste //
translated: The characteristics of the long and short [periods] should be known.

original: mnyam dus chu tshod gsum dang ni //
analyzed: mnyam dus chu tshod gsum dang ni //
translated: At the time of the equinoxes, there are three hours

original: chu srang bzhi bcu rtsa lngar ldan //
analyzed: chu srang bzhi bcu rtsa lngar ldan //
translated: and forty-five minutes.

original: de yi thun phyed kun la sbyar //
analyzed: de yi thun phyed kun la sbyar //
translated: This is applied to all half-periods.

original: gza' rnams kyi ni thun phyed brgyad //
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi ni thun phyed brgyad //
translated: The half-periods of the planets are eight.

original: de la 'char ba nges par mthong //
analyzed: de la 'char ba nges par mthong //
translated: One should see the rising [of the planets] in them.

original: lnga dang bzhi sogs sbyar zhes bya //
analyzed: lnga dang bzhi sogs sbyar zhes bya //
translated: [The periods] of five, four, and so on are applied.

original: thun phyed longs spyod bdun gyis bsgyur //
analyzed: thun phyed longs spyod bdun gyis bsgyur //
translated: The half-periods are multiplied by seven.

original: de la drug cus bgos thob pa //
analyzed: de la drug cus bgos thob pa //
translated: Dividing that by sixty, the quotient

original: chu tshod du 'gyur lhag chu srang //
analyzed: chu tshod du 'gyur lhag chu srang //
translated: is the hours, the remainder the minutes.

original: de ltar gza' rnams re re zhing //
analyzed: de ltar gza' rnams re re zhing //
translated: Thus, each of the planets

original: rang gi thun mtshams phyed du dran //
analyzed: rang gi thun mtshams phyed du dran //
translated: is remembered for half of its own period.

original: zla ba la sogs drug la sogs te //
analyzed: zla ba la sogs drug la sogs te //
translated: The six, the moon and so forth,

original: de la rigs ldan 'char bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de la rigs ldan 'char bar 'gyur //
translated: are the ascendants in that [order].

original: drug pa sogs pa'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: drug pa sogs pa'i bye brag gis //
translated: By the distinction of the sixth and so forth,

original: bya ba thams cad sngar bzhin rigs //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad sngar bzhin rigs //
translated: all activities are to be understood as before.

original: nyi ma'i chu tshod nyi shu drug //🔽chu srang bco lda ri sras mo //🔽zla ba'i chu tshod ni shu gnyis //
analyzed: nyi ma'i chu tshod nyi shu drug // chu srang bco lda ri sras mo // zla ba'i chu tshod ni shu gnyis //
translated: Twenty-six ghaṭikās of the sun🔽are said to be one kalā of the sun.

original: lha mo chu srang sum cur bzhed //
analyzed: lha mo chu srang sum cur bzhed //
translated: Thirty-two ghaṭikās of the moon🔽are said to be one kalā of the moon.

original: chu tshod bco lnga mig dmar la //
analyzed: chu tshod bco lnga mig dmar la //
translated: Fifteen ghaṭikās of Mars

original: chu srang bzhi bcu zhe lda yin ;
analyzed: chu srang bzhi bcu zhe lda yin ;
translated: are said to be forty kalās.

original: / gza' lhag chu tshod bco lnga ste //🔽chu srang stong par yongs su grags //
analyzed: / gza' lhag chu tshod bco lnga ste // chu srang stong par yongs su grags //
translated: Fifteen ghaṭikās of Mercury

original: phur bu'i chu tshod bcu gcig ste //
analyzed: phur bu'i chu tshod bcu gcig ste //
translated: are said to be one thousand kalās.🔽Eleven ghaṭikās of Jupiter

original: chu srang bco lnga zhes byar grags //
analyzed: chu srang bco lnga zhes byar grags //
translated: are said to be fifteen kalās.

original: pa sangs chu tshod bdun yin te /🔽chu srang sum cu spen pa la //
analyzed: pa sangs chu tshod bdun yin te / chu srang sum cu spen pa la //
translated: Seven ghaṭikās of Venus🔽are said to be thirty kalās.

original: gsum dang bzhi bcu rtsa lngar brjod //
analyzed: gsum dang bzhi bcu rtsa lngar brjod //
translated: Three and forty-five [kalās] are said to be

original: de rnams rigs ldan thun mtshams te /
analyzed: de rnams rigs ldan thun mtshams te /
translated: the periods of the planets.

original: las dang bya ba thams cad la //
analyzed: las dang bya ba thams cad la //
translated: In all actions and activities,

original: ci la bab kyang gzab par bya //
analyzed: ci la bab kyang gzab par bya //
translated: one should be careful whatever the case.

original: 'di ltar dus sbyor phyed pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar dus sbyor phyed pa ni //
translated: Thus, the division of the conjunctions

original: mnyam tshe dbyu gu gnyis dang phyed //
analyzed: mnyam tshe dbyu gu gnyis dang phyed //
translated: is two and a half ghaṭikās when equal.

original: de la gza' rnams dbang byed pa //
analyzed: de la gza' rnams dbang byed pa //
translated: The planets rule

original: drug gi grangs la bskor bar dran //
analyzed: drug gi grangs la bskor bar dran //
translated: in the order of the numbers six.

original: nyin mo de yin lha btsun ma //
analyzed: nyin mo de yin lha btsun ma //
translated: That is the day, O Queen of the Gods;

original: mtshan mo dbyu gu gnyis dang phyed //
analyzed: mtshan mo dbyu gu gnyis dang phyed //
translated: the night is two and a half ghaṭikās.

original: dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po rnams //
analyzed: dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po rnams //
translated: The lords of the half conjunctions

original: lnga la rim pas bskor ba yin //
analyzed: lnga la rim pas bskor ba yin //
translated: are in the order of the five.

original: spen pa'i longs spyod dus su ni //
analyzed: spen pa'i longs spyod dus su ni //
translated: At the time of the enjoyment of Saturn,

original: rigs ldan ci nas spang bar bya //
analyzed: rigs ldan ci nas spang bar bya //
translated: one should avoid the Rāhu conjunction by all means.

original: dge 'joms sdig pa can de ni //
analyzed: dge 'joms sdig pa can de ni //
translated: That evil destroyer of virtue

original: spangs bas rang gi las kun 'grub //
analyzed: spangs bas rang gi las kun 'grub //
translated: is abandoned, and one accomplishes all one’s actions.

original: nyi ma nas ni pa sangs dang // nyi ma nas ni phur bu sogs //
analyzed: nyi ma nas ni pa sangs dang // nyi ma nas ni phur bu sogs //
translated: From the sun to Venus, from the sun to Jupiter,

original: nyin dang mtshan gyi dus sbyor phyed //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan gyi dus sbyor phyed //
translated: and so on, the half conjunctions of day and night

original: drug dang lnga aaru 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: drug dang lnga aaru 'gyur ba yin //
translated: are six and five arousals.

original: de ltar dus sbyor phyed shes pa //
analyzed: de ltar dus sbyor phyed shes pa //
translated: Thus, one who knows the half conjunctions

original: legs par rtogs sam gangs sa ri'i bdag / nyi ma mtha' yas zla ba gla //
analyzed: legs par rtogs sam gangs sa ri'i bdag / nyi ma mtha' yas zla ba gla //
translated: Understand them well, O lord of the snowy mountains.

original: nor rgyas mig dmar 'jog por dran //
analyzed: nor rgyas mig dmar 'jog por dran //
translated: The sun is infinite, the moon is the moon.

original: gza' lhag stobs kyi rgyu zhes bya //
analyzed: gza' lhag stobs kyi rgyu zhes bya //
translated: The planets are known as Jupiter, Mars, Saturn,

original: phur bu padma pa sangs ni //
analyzed: phur bu padma pa sangs ni //
translated: Mercury, Venus, and Rāhu.

original: padma chen por shes par bya //
analyzed: padma chen por shes par bya //
translated: Rāhu is known as Ketu.🔽The moon is known as Śukra.

original: spen pa dung skyong shes par bya //
analyzed: spen pa dung skyong shes par bya //
translated: Śukra is known as Śani.

original: klu dang gza' bdun rim pa bzhin //🔽shes par bya'i ri sras mo //
analyzed: klu dang gza' bdun rim pa bzhin // shes par bya'i ri sras mo //
translated: The seven planets and the seven nāgas are in sequence.

original: brgyad @91a * //
analyzed: brgyad @91a * //
translated: The eight are known as the sons of the mountain.

original: pa rigs ldan nyid yin te //
analyzed: pa rigs ldan nyid yin te //
translated: The ninth is the one of the lineage.

original: r'a hu drag po'i gza' ru 'gyur //🔽thun phyed longs spyod gza' rnams la //
analyzed: r'a hu drag po'i gza' ru 'gyur // thun phyed longs spyod gza' rnams la //
translated: Rāhu becomes the fierce planet.

original: klu rnams 'char bar yongs su grags //
analyzed: klu rnams 'char bar yongs su grags //
translated: The nāgas are known to rise in the planets at the time of the partaking of the half-period.

original: chu srang bcu drug nyi ma'i dbus //
analyzed: chu srang bcu drug nyi ma'i dbus //
translated: Sixteen ghaṭikās are in the middle of the sun.

original: spang bya gzhan la skyon med dran //🔽pa sangs mtha' ma'i chu srang bzhi //
analyzed: spang bya gzhan la skyon med dran // pa sangs mtha' ma'i chu srang bzhi //
translated: The others are to be abandoned, and one should remember the faults.🔽The last four ghaṭikās are of Śukra.

original: gza' lhag sngon ma'i chu srang gnyis //
analyzed: gza' lhag sngon ma'i chu srang gnyis //
translated: The first two ghaṭikās are of Budha.

original: zla ba'i dbus su chu srang brgyad //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su chu srang brgyad //
translated: Eight ghaṭikās are in the middle of the moon.

original: spen pa'i mtha' mar chu srang bzhi //
analyzed: spen pa'i mtha' mar chu srang bzhi //
translated: The last four ghaṭikās are of Śani.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum phur bu'i dbus //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum phur bu'i dbus //
translated: In the middle of the nakṣatra Puṣya,🔽in the first two hours of Mars,

original: mig dmar thog ma'i chu srang drug / bzang po'i gtam yin ri sras mo //
analyzed: mig dmar thog ma'i chu srang drug / bzang po'i gtam yin ri sras mo //
translated: is the good story of the daughter of the mountain.

original: rigs ldan 'char bar the tshom med //
analyzed: rigs ldan 'char bar the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt that the one born in the nakṣatra will be a kṣatriya.

original: chu tshod phyed dang gsum la ni //
analyzed: chu tshod phyed dang gsum la ni //
translated: In one hour and a half,

original: dus sbyor byed pa nges par mthong //🔽drug dang lnga ni rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: dus sbyor byed pa nges par mthong // drug dang lnga ni rim pa bzhin //
translated: the one born in the nakṣatra of the creator is certainly seen.

original: nyon mongs la sogs las shes bya //
analyzed: nyon mongs la sogs las shes bya //
translated: Six and five are to be known as the actions of affliction, and so on.

original: spen pa'i dus sbyor phyed pa'i dus //
analyzed: spen pa'i dus sbyor phyed pa'i dus //
translated: The nakṣatra of Śukra is the time of the half-nakṣatra.

original: gang yin rigs ldan 'char bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang yin rigs ldan 'char bar 'gyur //
translated: The one born in the nakṣatra will be a kṣatriya.

original: bya ba thams cad nyams byed pas //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad nyams byed pas //
translated: Since all actions are destroyed,

original: ci nas 'di ni spang bar bya //🔽gza' yi cha la ci rigs pa //
analyzed: ci nas 'di ni spang bar bya // gza' yi cha la ci rigs pa //
translated: this [nakṣatra] should be avoided.🔽The nāgas arise in the proper order

original: klu rnams 'char bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: klu rnams 'char bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: in the parts of the planets.

original: rgya mtsho drang srong mig dang ni //
analyzed: rgya mtsho drang srong mig dang ni //
translated: The sage’s eye, the ocean,

original: 'byung ba dang ni nor lha mo //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang ni nor lha mo //
translated: the element, the goddess of wealth,

original: ro ste nyi ma sogs rim bzhin //
analyzed: ro ste nyi ma sogs rim bzhin //
translated: the corpse, and the sun, respectively,

original: thun phyed sgra gcan drag por dran //
analyzed: thun phyed sgra gcan drag por dran //
translated: are remembered as Rāhu and Aṅgāraka in half a watch.

original: 'byung ba mig dang ro dang me //
analyzed: 'byung ba mig dang ro dang me //
translated: The element, the eye, the corpse, and fire,

original: ri dang rgya mtsho zla ba ni //
analyzed: ri dang rgya mtsho zla ba ni //
translated: the mountain, the ocean, and the moon,

original: mig dmar r'a hu zhes bya ba //
analyzed: mig dmar r'a hu zhes bya ba //
translated: The one called Rāhu, the red-eyed,

original: gzhan gsad pa dang dug sbyor 'grub //
analyzed: gzhan gsad pa dang dug sbyor 'grub //
translated: is successful in killing others and in applying poison.

original: de ltar thun mtshams bdun pa dang // drug lnga bzhi gsum gnyis gcig rnams //
analyzed: de ltar thun mtshams bdun pa dang // drug lnga bzhi gsum gnyis gcig rnams //
translated: Thus, the seven periods, six, five, four, three, two, and one,

original: nyi ma la sogs rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: nyi ma la sogs rim pa bzhin //
translated: are in order, the sun and so forth.

original: klu yi dug de ci nas 'dzem //
analyzed: klu yi dug de ci nas 'dzem //
translated: The poison of the nāgas is to be avoided.

original: ji ltar nyi ma la sogs pa //🔽gang la khyim ni 'pho ba na //
analyzed: ji ltar nyi ma la sogs pa // gang la khyim ni 'pho ba na //
translated: Just as the sun and so forth

original: mtho ris la sogs bdag po rnams //
analyzed: mtho ris la sogs bdag po rnams //
translated: are the lords of the heavens and so forth

original: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya //
translated: in order, one should know

original: 'pho ba bcu gnyis bdag po ni //
analyzed: 'pho ba bcu gnyis bdag po ni //
translated: the lords of the twelve transits.

original: sdig can gyur na mi dge byed //
analyzed: sdig can gyur na mi dge byed //
translated: If they are sinful, they act unvirtuously;

original: bsod nams kyis ni dge bar ston //
analyzed: bsod nams kyis ni dge bar ston //
translated: if they are meritorious, they teach virtue.

original: 'dren mas 'bring por 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: 'dren mas 'bring por 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The leader is the middle one;

original: mang nyung las ni dge mi dge /'bras bu mthong bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: mang nyung las ni dge mi dge /'bras bu mthong bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: the virtuous and nonvirtuous results are seen from the many and few.

original: lha mo dbyangs char zhes bya ba //
analyzed: lha mo dbyangs char zhes bya ba //
translated: The goddess known as “Rain of Melody”

original: dgos don ma tshang med pa yi //🔽rgyud 'di bla ma'i man ngag las //
analyzed: dgos don ma tshang med pa yi // rgyud 'di bla ma'i man ngag las //
translated: is the one who is not lacking in the purpose of the ritual.🔽This tantra is to be understood without doubt

original: the tshom med par shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: the tshom med par shes par 'gyur //
translated: from the guru’s instruction.

original: 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid mang po rnams //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid mang po rnams //
translated: The many characteristics of the cakras

original: gzhung gi mthar thug 'di las shes //
analyzed: gzhung gi mthar thug 'di las shes //
translated: The ultimate of the scriptures is known from this.

original: gang tshe bla ma'i man ngag bral //
analyzed: gang tshe bla ma'i man ngag bral //
translated: When one is without the guru's instructions,

original: de tshe bstan bcos gzhung 'di spangs //
analyzed: de tshe bstan bcos gzhung 'di spangs //
translated: then one should abandon this treatise.

original: gang zhig thams cad ltas 'di las //
analyzed: gang zhig thams cad ltas 'di las //
translated: One who sees this sign in everything

original: 'bras bu mang po mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bras bu mang po mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: will see many results.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i skye bos kyang//
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i skye bos kyang//
translated: Even the omniscient one

original: @91b don med dga' bas 'dir zhugs na //
analyzed: @91b don med dga' bas 'dir zhugs na //
translated: enters here with meaningless joy.

original: bshad pa'i 'khor los 'dri byed la //
analyzed: bshad pa'i 'khor los 'dri byed la //
translated: The one who is questioned by the wheel of explanation

original: 'bras bu phral du mthong ba yin //
analyzed: 'bras bu phral du mthong ba yin //
translated: sees the result immediately.🔽The wheel of the occasion of birth, the wheel of time,

original: skyes pa'i gnas skabs 'khor lo dang // dus kyi 'khor lo ri sras mo //
analyzed: skyes pa'i gnas skabs 'khor lo dang // dus kyi 'khor lo ri sras mo //
translated: the daughter of the mountain,🔽Avakāhada itself,

original: aa ba ka ha da nyid dang // sha ha ba ta seng ge'i gdan //
analyzed: aa ba ka ha da nyid dang // sha ha ba ta seng ge'i gdan //
translated: and the lion throne of Śāhava.🔽Likewise, the wheel of ornaments

original: de bzhin rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang // mdzes ma mthong ba'i 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang // mdzes ma mthong ba'i 'khor lo ste //
translated: and the wheel of seeing the beautiful one,

original: de rnams 'bru yi bye brag kun //
analyzed: de rnams 'bru yi bye brag kun //
translated: all of those are the various seeds.

original: bshad do dpa' bos phyag byas ma //
analyzed: bshad do dpa' bos phyag byas ma //
translated: The hero has bowed to the explanation.

original: r'a hu'i 'khor lo mang po yang //
analyzed: r'a hu'i 'khor lo mang po yang //
translated: The many wheels of Rāhu

original: mdor bsdus brgyad bshad ri sras mo //
analyzed: mdor bsdus brgyad bshad ri sras mo //
translated: are explained in brief as eight, daughter of the mountain.

original: khyad par yud tsam 'khor lo 'dis //
analyzed: khyad par yud tsam 'khor lo 'dis //
translated: This special wheel of moments

original: 'bras bu chen po sbyin pa yin //
analyzed: 'bras bu chen po sbyin pa yin //
translated: And will give great results.

original: bzang mo de snyed bshad pa 'dis //
analyzed: bzang mo de snyed bshad pa 'dis //
translated: By this explanation of the good,

original: kun la dbyangs 'char nges pa yin //
analyzed: kun la dbyangs 'char nges pa yin //
translated: The melody is certain to arise in all.

original: dbyangs 'char spong ba'i blun po ni //🔽nor bu phyugs la ji ltar bur //
analyzed: dbyangs 'char spong ba'i blun po ni // nor bu phyugs la ji ltar bur //
translated: The fool who abandons the melody🔽Is like a cow with a jewel.

original: kha yi nor bu dpal min bzhin //
analyzed: kha yi nor bu dpal min bzhin //
translated: The jewel in the mouth is not glory.

original: skyes bu blun pos mchog 'di smod //
analyzed: skyes bu blun pos mchog 'di smod //
translated: The fool despises this supreme [tantra].

original: the tshom med cing 'jigs med pa //
analyzed: the tshom med cing 'jigs med pa //
translated: Without doubt and fearless,

original: g-yul las rgyal ba seng ge 'dra //
analyzed: g-yul las rgyal ba seng ge 'dra //
translated: Like a lion victorious in battle.

original: rjes su bsngags pa'i stong phrag gcig /'di yi tshad mdzod lhas mchod ma //
analyzed: rjes su bsngags pa'i stong phrag gcig /'di yi tshad mdzod lhas mchod ma //
translated: The one with a thousand praises, the measure of this is the god-worshipped treasury.

original: the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud //
analyzed: the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud //
translated: The tantra that cuts all doubts,

original: lha mos gsang ba las kyang gsang //
analyzed: lha mos gsang ba las kyang gsang //
translated: Secret even from the secret goddesses.

original: mchog tu gsang bas rna bzhi pa //
analyzed: mchog tu gsang bas rna bzhi pa //
translated: The supreme secret, the four ears,

original: shin tu sbas 'grub lha mo kye //
analyzed: shin tu sbas 'grub lha mo kye //
translated: The hidden accomplishment, goddess Hey!

original: sdig pa la brtson g-yo sgyu can //
analyzed: sdig pa la brtson g-yo sgyu can //
translated: Those who strive in evil, deceitful,

original: khro zhing ma rungs las la dga' //
analyzed: khro zhing ma rungs las la dga' //
translated: Wrathful, and enjoy violent actions,

original: med pa ba dang rgyud 'tshong ba //
analyzed: med pa ba dang rgyud 'tshong ba //
translated: The nihilistic, and those who sell tantras,

original: gus med rnams la sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: gus med rnams la sbyin mi bya //
translated: Should not be given to the disrespectful.

original: bla ma la gus sems zhi ba //
analyzed: bla ma la gus sems zhi ba //
translated: Those who respect the guru, have a peaceful mind,

original: bden smra rtag tu dge la brtson //
analyzed: bden smra rtag tu dge la brtson //
translated: The truth-speaker is always striving for virtue.

original: bstan bcos dam pa rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: bstan bcos dam pa rnyed dka' ba //
translated: This excellent treatise is difficult to find.

original: 'di la sbyin bya las mchod ma //
analyzed: 'di la sbyin bya las mchod ma //
translated: Here, the offering is made to the one who is worshipped.

original: dpal ldan khyu mchog rgyal mtshan las //🔽grub thob autpal dbyu gu des //
analyzed: dpal ldan khyu mchog rgyal mtshan las // grub thob autpal dbyu gu des //
translated: From the glorious banner of the bull🔽The adept Utpalajīvaka

original: dbyangs 'char bstan bcos 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: dbyangs 'char bstan bcos 'di nyid ni //
translated: Has illuminated this treatise, the Arisen Melody,

original: sa steng 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad //
analyzed: sa steng 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad //
translated: On the surface of the earth.

original: 'di ni g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las lhag pa'i las sna tshogs bstan pa chen po ste le'u bcu pa'o /
analyzed: 'di ni g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las lhag pa'i las sna tshogs bstan pa chen po ste le'u bcu pa'o /
translated: This is the great teaching of the various superior activities from the King of Tantras Victorious in Battle, the tenth chapter.

original: // / g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dbyangs 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos rdzogs so /
analyzed: // / g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dbyangs 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos rdzogs so /
translated: The treatise called Arisen Melody, the king of tantras called Victorious in Battle, is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta dpal dza ya a'a nanda chen po dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rmongs pa'i gnyen po dgos 'dod pa thams cad 'byung bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta dpal dza ya a'a nanda chen po dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rmongs pa'i gnyen po dgos 'dod pa thams cad 'byung bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
translated: The Indian preceptor, the great paṇḍita Śrī Jñānaśrī, and the Tibetan translator, the monk Möngpe Nyenpo, the one who fulfills all needs and desires, translated, edited, and finalized this text.
